schema.title: Action target templates
schema.description: The collection of action target templates

id.description: Unique identifier given by the server

key.description: Unique key generated by the server to be used in events.

name.description: A name to identify the action target template

public.description: Make the action target template available to everybody.

organizationId.description: The organization that offer the action target template.

configuration.description: Providing a schema aims to help the WUI for configuration.

token.description: JSON Web Token to be authenticated when contacting the configuration URL.

configurationUi.description: Provide the configuration for the dynamic UI.

schemaForm.description: Valid form schema accordingly to: http://schemaform.io

token.description: JSON Web Token to be authenticated when contacting the action target URL.
